instagram.description: Discover the best experiences in Punta Cana, exclusive photos, and special offers only for our followers.

mainText.title: Xclusive Experiences
mainText.subtitle: At Lux Punta Cana, we understand that the most precious moments are not born of chance, but are masterpieces of intentional design. Each of our services from luxurious SUV transfers that envelop you in comfort and elegance to serene private yacht cruises that cradle you in the calm of the sea and gourmet dining experiences that awaken your senses are meticulously crafted not just to create fleeting instants, but to forge memories that resonate in your heart. Because true luxury is not defined by the superficial;
mainText.slogan: it is the ability to touch the soul and create connections that endure.

gallery.title: Our Luxury Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Explore our exclusive collection of luxury experiences and moments in Punta Cana

footer.slogan: Experience luxury vacations in the beautiful Punta Cana, Dominican Republic.

package-standard.title: Choose Your Experience
package-standard.subtitle: Select the package that fits your vacation needs. Each option offers unique services to enhance your stay.
package-standard.standard: This package provides a comprehensive vacation experience, thoughtfully designed to encompass all the essential services for your ultimate comfort and convenience.

package-luxe.subtitle: This package presents an opportunity to indulge in elevated experiences, seamlessly complemented by our lux services.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our packages and services
faqs.question1: What happens if the weather is bad?
faqs.answer1: In case of bad weather affecting safety (storm, hurricane, heavy rain, or rough seas) the activity will be rescheduled at no additional cost. If rescheduling is not possible, a partial or full refund will be issued depending on the service policy.
faqs.answer2: Cancellations made more than 72 hours in advance: full refund. Cancellations before 48 hours: partial refund (50%). Cancellations less than 24 hours or no-show: non-refundable.
faqs.answer3: We accept credit and debit cards through Stripe, as well as international or local bank transfers. All payments are secure and protected.
faqs.question4: Are the services private or shared?
faqs.answer4: Most of our services are private and personalized. If an experience is shared, you will be informed in advance.
faqs.question5: What if I need to change my reservation date?
faqs.answer5: You may request a date change at least 48 hours in advance, subject to availability.
faqs.stillHaveQuestionsText: Our team is here to help you plan your perfect Punta Cana experience.

hero.title: Lux Punta Cana
hero.subtitle: Elevate your experience with Xclusive services

packages.title: Choose Your Experience
packages.subtitle: Select the package that fits your vacation needs. Each option offers unique services to enhance your stay.

consierge.title: Need Help? Our Concierge Team Is Ready
consierge.subtitle: Not sure which services to select? Our experienced concierge team is available to guide you through creating the perfect package tailored to your preferences.
consierge.option1: Expert advice on selecting the perfect mix of services
consierge.option2: Personalized suggestions based on your preferences
consierge.option3: Assistance with special requests and arrangements
consierge.testimonial: Our team is dedicated to crafting the perfect vacation experience for you. We're here to make your dream vacation a reality.

services.subtitle: Select the services you would like to include in your booking.

standardPage.title: Your Standard Experience
standardPage.subtitle: Discover handpicked services designed to make your Punta Cana adventure unforgettable. Each experience is crafted with care and attention to detail.

header.subtitle: Exclusive Experiences
header.title: Our Services

emptyState.title: No se encontraron servicios
emptyState.description: Intenta seleccionar una categoría diferente para explorar nuestros servicios.

cta.title: We Create Your Perfect Experience
cta.description: Our team of experts is ready to design a completely personalized vacation that will exceed all your expectations.

yoga.name: Yoga
yoga.title: EXPERIENCE A PERSONALIZED PRACTICE:
yoga.short: Expert-led sessions tailored to your needs in the comfort of your space
yoga.full: Enjoy a 60-minute private yoga class in the serene comfort of your vacation rental. Whether you are new to yoga or deepening your practice, our internationally certified instructors tailor each session to your goals and preferred style.
yoga.full2: This isn’t just a yoga class—it’s a customized wellness experience designed around you. Whether you are focusing on flexibility, strength, mindfulness, mobility, or prenatal care, every detail is thoughtfully adapted to your unique journey.
yoga.slogan2: Let us bring wellness to your door.
yoga.disclaimer: For your safety and peace of mind, we recommend consulting with your physician before beginning any new physical activity—especially if pregnant, recovering from an injury, or managing a health condition. Participation is at your own discretion.
yoga.finalMessage: Listen to your body. This is your time. Your space. Your pace.

experienceShowcase.subtitle: Every moment aboard {catamaranName} is designed to create unforgettable memories in Caribbean paradise.

bikeRentals.name: Bike Rentals
bikeRentals.short: Explore the resort on our comfortable bicycles
bikeRentals.full: Explore Punta Cana on two wheels with our bike rentals. Perfect for cruising along the beach, through natural surroundings, or around the city in a comfortable and eco-friendly way. Pedal, discover, and experience every corner. Book your bike today and start your adventure!

airportTransfers.name: Airport Transfers
airportTransfers.short: Convenient transportation to and from Punta Cana Airport
airportTransfers.full: Enjoy a comfortable and safe transfer to and from the airport with our private transportation service. We take you directly to your destination, so you can start your Punta Cana experience worry-free. Book your transfer today and travel with peace of mind.

catamaranTrips.name: Catamaran Trips
catamaranTrips.short: Enjoy a unique experience at sea with our catamaran excursions.
catamaranTrips.full: Experience a unique adventure on the sea with our catamaran trips. Enjoy stunning landscapes, crystal-clear waters, and the tranquility of sailing along the coast of Punta Cana. Book your trip today and sail to paradise.

golfCartRentals.name: Golf Cart Rentals
golfCartRentals.short: Cruise your resort, villa community, or local beach town with one of our fully charged, comfortable golf carts.
golfCartRentals.full: Enjoy the freedom to explore Punta Cana at your own pace with our golf cart rentals. Perfect for getting around resorts, beaches, and local trails in comfort. Drive, explore, and enjoy at your own pace. Book your cart today and discover Punta Cana.

personalTraining.name: Personal Training
personalTraining.short: One-on-one fitness sessions with certified trainers
personalTraining.full: Stay in shape during your vacation with our personal training sessions. Work out with certified professionals who tailor each session to your level, goals, and schedule. Book today and become your best self in Punta Cana.

babysitter.name: Babysitter
babysitter.short: Trust our experienced, background-checked babysitters to care for your little ones in the comfort of your villa or resort
babysitter.full: Trust our experienced, background-checked babysitters to care for your little ones in the comfort of your villa or resort. Whether you need a few hours of evening respite or full-day childcare, our professionals engage children with safe, age-appropriate activities and attentive supervision.
babysitter.availabilityAnswer: Day, afternoon and evening; night service on request.
babysitter.CTAHeaderSubTitle: Your Peace of Mind. Their Happiness.
babysitter.CTATitle: Ready to Enjoy Your Time While Your Children are in Great Hands?
babysitter.CTASubTitle: Schedule professional, reliable childcare and treat yourself to worry-free time away
babysitter.faqQuestion1: What if I need to extend the babysitting time?
babysitter.faqAnswer1: Extensions are possible subject to the babysitter is availability. Please notify us as soon as possible, and we will confirm with your assigned sitter.
babysitter.faqQuestion2: Can I meet the babysitter before booking?
babysitter.faqAnswer2: Absolutely! We encourage a meet-and-greet before your scheduled service. This can be arranged in-person or via video call.
babysitter.faqQuestion3: What happens if my child gets sick?
babysitter.faqAnswer3: Our babysitters are trained to handle minor health concerns. For emergencies, they will contact you immediately and follow predetermined emergency protocols.
babysitter.testimonial1: 'Our children absolutely adored their babysitter! She was punctual, professional, and had an amazing rapport with the kids. We could enjoy our evening knowing they were in safe, caring hands.'
babysitter.testimonial2: The level of professionalism was outstanding. Our babysitter came prepared with age-appropriate activities that kept our children engaged throughout the evening.
babysitter.testimonial3: This is the only babysitting service I trust with my little ones. The screening process for caregivers is thorough, and the sitter assigned to us was exceptional.

horsebackRiding.name: Horseback Riding
horsebackRiding.short: Enjoy a guided ride along beaches, trails, and breathtaking landscapes—perfect for all experience levels. Book your horseback adventure and live an unforgettable experience.
horsebackRiding.full: Discover the natural beauty of Punta Cana on horseback. Enjoy a guided ride along beaches, trails, and breathtaking landscapes—perfect for all experience levels. Book your horseback adventure and live an unforgettable experience.

importantObservation.description: Your clothes WILL get dirty from the muddy trails! Wear old clothes that you don't mind getting messy.
importantObservation.note: Sunglasses and bandanas are available for purchase at the ranch if needed.

weather.title: 🌦️ Weather Policy
weather.description: The excursion does NOT cancel for rain! We only cancel in extreme weather conditions. Come prepared for an adventure regardless of weather.

photo.title: 📸 Photo Disclaimer
photo.description: Photos taken during our excursions may be used for promotional purposes. Professional action shots are included in your adventure experience.

specialBanner.title: Off-Road Adventure
specialBanner.subtitle: Through Paradise
specialBanner.description: Navigate through tropical jungles, splash through crystal-clear rivers, and discover hidden beaches on the ultimate ATV adventure. Our eco-friendly tours respect nature while delivering maximum thrills.

terrain.title: Diverse Terrain Exploration
terrain.description: From dense jungle trails to pristine beaches and refreshing cenotes, experience the full spectrum of tropical paradise.

equipment.title: Xclusive Equipment Fleet
equipment.description: Choose from ATVs, Buggies, or Polaris RZRs - all regularly maintained and equipped with latest safety features.

ecoTourism.title: Eco-Responsible Tourism
ecoTourism.description: We follow strict environmental guidelines to preserve the natural beauty for future generations.

carlos.name: Carlos Rodriguez
carlos.text: Incredible ATV adventure! The jungle trails were amazing and the cenote swim was refreshing.

jennifer.name: Jennifer Smith
jennifer.text: Perfect for beginners! Our guide was patient and the buggy was easy to handle. Loved every minute!

alex.name: Alex Thompson
alex.text: Best excursion in Punta Cana! The ATV was powerful and the routes were thrilling but safe.

cenoteNotice.title: 🏊‍♂️ Important: Cenote Swimming
cenoteNotice.description: Life vests are NOT included for cenote swimming and must be purchased as an additional service at the location.
cenoteNotice.note: Swimming in the cenote is completely optional. Safety equipment can be rented on-site for those who wish to swim.

atvService.safetyNotice: All safety equipment and professional guidance included for vehicle operation

hero.subtitle: Macao Beach

step4.description: Enjoy recreation time at the beautiful river

horseDisclaimer.title: About Our Dominican Horses
horseDisclaimer.paragraph1: Dominican horses are different from European horses - they're perfectly adapted to tropical climate and terrain. Our horses are well-cared for, regularly veterinarian-checked, and trained specifically for tourist activities.
horseDisclaimer.paragraph2: We follow all animal welfare standards and treat our horses with utmost respect and care.

weatherPolicy.title: Weather Policy
weatherPolicy.description: Tours continue rain or shine! We only cancel in extreme weather conditions.

review1.name: Sarah Johnson
review1.text: Amazing experience! The ride was magical and our guide was excellent.

review2.name: Mike Chen
review2.text: Perfect for beginners. Felt safe the whole time and the beach views were incredible.

review3.name: Emma Davis
review3.text: Swimming with the horses was unforgettable. Highly recommend this tour!

benefit1.title: Expert Local Guides
benefit1.description: Our bilingual guides know every trail and ensure your safety and enjoyment throughout the journey.

benefit2.title: Well-Trained Horses
benefit2.description: Our horses are gentle, well-cared for, and perfectly trained for beach riding.

benefit3.title: Stunning Locations
benefit3.description: Ride through pristine beaches, crystal-clear rivers, and tropical landscapes.

benefit4.title: All-Inclusive Experience
benefit4.description: Transportation, equipment, and refreshments all included in one price.

specialBanner.title: Create Memories That
specialBanner.description: Join over 800+ happy riders who've experienced the magic of Macao Beach on horseback. Our gentle horses and expert guides ensure a safe, unforgettable adventure for riders of all levels.

testimonial1.quote: Maria was absolutely wonderful with our twins. They were engaged and happy the entire evening!
testimonial1.author: Sarah M.

testimonial2.quote: Professional, caring, and the kids loved her. We felt completely at ease during our date night.
testimonial2.author: David L.

testimonial3.quote: Our babysitter came prepared with activities and even helped with bedtime routine. Highly recommend!
testimonial3.author: Jessica R.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our babysitting services

question1.question: What ages do you provide babysitting services for?
question1.answer: We provide professional childcare for children from 6 months to 12 years old. Our sitters are trained to handle different age groups and developmental stages.

question2.question: Are your babysitters background checked?
question2.answer: Yes, all our babysitters undergo thorough background checks, reference verification, and childcare training. Your children's safety is our top priority.

question3.question: What if my child has special dietary requirements or allergies?
question3.answer: We carefully review all dietary restrictions and allergies before the service. Our sitters are trained to handle special dietary needs and can prepare appropriate snacks and meals.

question4.question: How far in advance should I book?
question4.answer: We recommend booking at least 24-48 hours in advance to ensure availability. For last-minute requests, please call us directly and we'll do our best to accommodate.

header.title: Happy Kids Babysitting
header.subtitle: Professional childcare in the comfort of your accommodation

hero.title: Saona Island
hero.subtitle: Full Day Excursion
hero.description: Enjoy a full day on one of the most beautiful islands in the Caribbean. Beach, nature and Dominican culture in one excursion.

itinerary.title: Complete Itinerary
itinerary.subtitle: Discover step by step your adventure in Saona Island

step1.title: Hotel Pickup
step1.description: Pickup at your hotel or resort. Our team will take you to the main meeting point.

step2.title: Meeting Point & Options
step2.description: Arrival at the meeting point where you can choose regular group transport or upgrade to private transport to arrive faster.

step3.title: Souvenir Stop
step3.description: Stop at local store to buy souvenirs, use the restroom and prepare for the adventure.

step4.title: Catamaran Experience
step4.description: Catamaran trip with music, entertainment, dancers and drinks included (soft drinks, ice, rum). Photographers offer additional services.

step5.title: Natural Pool Stop
step5.description: 15-minute stop at the famous natural pool with crystal clear waters and starfish.

step6.title: Saona Island Paradise
step6.description: Arrival at Saona Island. Enjoy the typical Dominican buffet with drinks, recreation area with beach loungers.

step7.title: Speedboat Return
step7.description: Return on speedboat (no refreshments) directly to the starting point.

step8.title: Return to Hotel
step8.description: Transport back to your hotel or resort, approximate arrival between 5:00 and 6:00 PM.

whatToBring.title: What to Bring
whatToBring.subtitle: Get ready for the perfect day in paradise

item4.title: Cash
item4.description: For souvenirs, tips and additional services

importantTip.title: Important Tip
importantTip.text: Wear comfortable clothes and swimsuit. Sunscreen is essential - the Caribbean sun is strong! Don't forget cash for tips and local souvenirs.

weatherDisclaimer.title: Weather Cancellation Policy
weatherDisclaimer.noRainCancel: The excursion is NOT cancelled due to rain.
weatherDisclaimer.description: The tropical Caribbean may have brief showers that do not affect the experience. Our catamarans and island areas are prepared for normal weather conditions.
weatherDisclaimer.onlyCancelled: The excursion is only cancelled in cases of
weatherDisclaimer.safetyRisk: that pose a risk to passenger safety, such as:
weatherDisclaimer.guaranteeText: If we cancel due to extreme conditions, we offer full refund or date change at no additional cost.

deepSeaFishing.name: Deep-Sea Fishing
deepSeaFishing.short: Exciting fishing excursions in the Caribbean Sea
deepSeaFishing.full: Embark on an exciting deep-sea fishing adventure with our expert captains. Explore deep waters, battle exotic species, and feel the thrill only the Caribbean Sea can offer. Set sail, fish, and create unforgettable memories. Book your deep-sea fishing trip today and feel the excitement of the catch.

privateChef.name: Private Chef Service
privateChef.short: Personalized culinary experiences in your accommodation
privateChef.full: Delight your palate with personalized gourmet creations by a private chef in your villa, apartment, or yacht. Our team crafts custom menus using fresh ingredients and local flavors, turning every meal into an unforgettable experience. Book your private chef today and enjoy a unique culinary experience in Punta Cana.

standardMassage.name: Massages
standardMassage.short: Relax and rejuvenate with our professional massage services...

atvExcursions.name: ATV Adventures
atvExcursions.short: Explore hidden beaches, jungle trails, and crystal-clear cenotes on the ultimate off-road adventure.

privateCatamaran.name: Catamaran Experience
privateCatamaran.short: Enjoy stunning landscapes, crystal-clear waters, and the tranquility of sailing along the coast of Punta Cana.
privateCatamaran.full: Deleita tu paladar con creaciones gourmet personalizadas por un chef privado en tu villa, apartamento o yate. Nuestro equipo elabora menús a tu medida, usando ingredientes frescos y sabores locales para convertir cada comida en un momento inolvidable. Reserva tu chef privado hoy y disfruta de una experiencia culinaria única en Punta Cana.

customDecorations.name: Custom Decorations
customDecorations.full: Enhance your events with custom decorations that reflect your style and theme. From floral arrangements to full setups, our team creates unique and memorable spaces. Surprise, delight, and celebrate in style. Book your personalized décor today and turn every detail into an extraordinary occasion.

adventureExcursions.name: Adventure Excursions
adventureExcursions.short: Thrilling activities and tours around Punta Cana
adventureExcursions.full: Experience the thrill of adventure with our excursions. Unique experiences surrounded by the lush nature of Punta Cana. Dare, explore, and push your limits. Book your adventure excursion today and challenge your limits.

karaoke.name: Private Karaoke Sessions
karaoke.short: Fun karaoke setup in your accommodation
karaoke.full: Enjoy a night full of music and fun with our karaoke service. Sing your favorite songs and create unforgettable memories with friends and family in a lively atmosphere. Sing, laugh, and turn every moment into a party! Book your karaoke session today and enjoy maximum fun.

saonaIslandTour.name: Saona Island Tour
saonaIslandTour.short: Day trip to the idyllic Caribbean island known for its pristine beaches and turquoise waters.
saonaIslandTour.full: A Saona Island tour is a popular excursion from Punta Cana and Bayahibe in the Dominican Republic, offering a day trip to the idyllic Caribbean island known for its pristine beaches and turquoise waters. Tours typically include transportation by speedboat and catamaran, a stop at a natural swimming pool, a buffet lunch, and an open bar, as well as time to relax on the beach and enjoy the scenery.

karaokeDetails.entertainmentDescription: Interactive entertainment for groups of all sizes
karaokeDetails.basicDescription: Standard karaoke equipment with wired microphones and speaker system
karaokeDetails.premiumDescription: High-quality sound system with special lighting effects and wireless microphones
karaokeDetails.withHostDescription: Professional host to manage the playlist, engage your guests, and keep the party going
karaokeDetails.withoutHostDescription: Self-managed karaoke experience with an easy-to-use interface
karaokeDetails.noiseConsiderations: Please be mindful of villa or resort quiet hours and local noise regulations

liveMusic.name: Live Music Entertainment
liveMusic.short: Local musicians performing at your event
liveMusic.full: Add a special touch to your celebration with live music entertainment. From Caribbean rhythms to international classics, our talented musicians will set the perfect mood for your event. Book today and let the music turn your night into an unforgettable experience.

hero.subtitle: Experience the transformative power of healing touch with our collection of {{count}} expertly crafted therapeutic treatments

quote.text: Take time to make your soul happy. Your body deserves the gift of healing touch, and your mind craves the peace that only comes from true relaxation.

services.subtitle: Each treatment is thoughtfully designed to address your unique wellness needs, combining ancient wisdom with modern therapeutic techniques

noResults.title: No treatments match your search
noResults.description: Try adjusting your filters to discover more healing experiences

cta.description: Escape the stress of daily life and immerse yourself in pure tranquility. Our expert therapists bring the spa experience directly to you.

features.therapists: Certified massage therapists with 5+ years experience
features.premium: Premium organic oils and heated massage tables
features.customized: Customized treatments for your unique needs

mindBalance.title: Mind Balance
mindBalance.description: Achieve mental clarity and emotional harmony

naturalHealing.title: Natural Healing
naturalHealing.description: Pure organic products for your wellness

homeComfort.title: Home Comfort
homeComfort.description: Luxury spa experience in your space

swedish.name: Swedish Relaxation
swedish.description: Gentle, flowing strokes to melt away tension and restore inner peace
swedish.longDescription: Our signature Swedish massage combines traditional techniques with aromatherapy to create a deeply relaxing experience that soothes both body and mind.

deepTissue.name: Deep Tissue Therapy
deepTissue.description: Intensive therapeutic massage targeting chronic tension and pain
deepTissue.longDescription: Designed for those who need serious muscle work, this therapy focuses on the deeper layers of muscle tissue to release chronic patterns of tension.

hotStone.name: Sacred Stone Ritual
hotStone.description: Heated volcanic stones create deep warmth and profound relaxation
hotStone.longDescription: Ancient healing meets modern luxury. Smooth, heated stones are placed on key points while warm stone massage melts away every trace of stress.

aromatherapy.name: Botanical Bliss
aromatherapy.description: A sensory journey with pure essential oils and healing touch
aromatherapy.longDescription: Customized essential oil blends enhance this therapeutic massage, creating a multi-sensory experience that harmonizes mind, body, and spirit.

prenatal.name: Nurturing Mother
prenatal.description: Specialized care designed for the expecting mother's unique needs
prenatal.longDescription: Our certified prenatal therapists provide safe, effective massage therapy to support you through your pregnancy journey with comfort and care.

sports.name: Athletic Recovery
sports.description: Performance-focused therapy to enhance athletic potential
sports.longDescription: Designed specifically for athletes and active individuals, combining therapeutic techniques to improve performance and prevent injuries.

couples.name: Romantic Escape
couples.description: Share the bliss of relaxation with your loved one
couples.longDescription: Side-by-side massage tables, candlelight, and synchronized treatments create an intimate wellness experience you'll treasure forever.

thai.name: Ancient Thai Healing
thai.description: Traditional stretching and pressure point massage from Thailand
thai.longDescription: This ancient healing art combines acupressure, assisted yoga stretches, and energy work to restore balance and flexibility to your entire being.

errors.booking: Error processing booking. Please try again.

luxeYacht.name: Lux Yacht
luxeYacht.short: Cruise the pristine Caribbean waters with a professional crew catering to your every need
luxeYacht.full: Experience ultimate luxury with our private yacht charter. Cruise the pristine Caribbean waters with a professional crew catering to your every need. Indulge in gourmet meals, premium beverages, and exclusive water activities.

hero.description: Discover the world's most exclusive yacht collection. Where every journey becomes an unforgettable masterpiece.

video.description: Immerse yourself in a cinematic journey through the crystal-clear waters of the Caribbean. Discover the elegance, luxury, and adventure that await you aboard our exclusive yachts.
video.ctaSubtitle: Book now and get exclusive benefits

yachtCta.cta1Description: Experience the ultimate luxury at sea. Book your exclusive yacht experience and create memories that last a lifetime.
yachtCta.cta2Description: Private charters, gourmet dining, and breathtaking Caribbean waters await. Your perfect escape is just one click away.

Cta.title: We are Ready to Create Your Dream Experience
Cta.subTitle: Our team of specialists is committed to making your vacation an unforgettable and personalized experience.
Cta.visitUsSubTitle: Enjoy our modern facilities in the heart of paradise.

about.title: About Lux Punta Cana
about.subTitle: Making sure your stay is filled with genuine comfort, authentic experiences, and memories you'll truly cherish.
about.stars: Creating exceptional luxury experiences in Punta Cana since our inception.

ourHistory.title: A Track Record of Excellence in Luxury Service
ourHistory.p1: At Lux Punta Cana we redefine the meaning of luxury and exclusivity in the Caribbean paradise. Our commitment is to create tailor-made experiences where every detail is designed to exceed expectations and turn your stay into an unforgettable memory.
ourHistory.p2: From private transfers to personalized services with high-end chefs, comprehensive wellness and select entertainment, we offer an exclusive range that elevates your trip to the highest standard.
ourHistory.p3: Our passion is to make every moment in Punta Cana extraordinary by combining sophistication, comfort and authenticity for those who seek to live the best experience.

difference.list1Text: Each experience is tailored to the unique preferences of our guests, creating a truly tailor-made vacation.
difference.list2Text: Our residences are carefully selected for their privileged location, design and premium amenities.
difference.list3Text: Our team of local professionals knows Punta Cana inside out and is available 24/7 to guarantee your satisfaction.
difference.list4Text: From private chefs to exclusive excursions, our concierge team takes care of every detail.

payment.successMessage: Thank you for your booking. We have sent a confirmation email to your inbox with all the details.
payment.helpText: If you have any questions about your booking, please contact our support team.

standardPage.subTitle: We guarantee the perfect vacation experience with essential services that transform your stay in Punta Cana into unforgettable memories, where adventure and relaxation are lived intensely.

services.title: Included Services
services.subtitle: Our standard package includes the following premium services to ensure your Punta Cana experience is comfortable, exciting, and memorable.

testimonial.title: Guest Testimonials
testimonial.subtitle: Dont just take our word for it. Here is what our guests have to say about their Lux Punta Cana  experience.
testimonial.testimonial1: The Lux Punta Cana made our family vacation so easy and enjoyable. The airport transfers were smooth, the golf cart was perfect for getting around, and the catamaran trip was a highlight for the kids. Having a chef come to our villa for a night was such a special experience. Highly recommend!
testimonial.testimonial2: My husband and I celebrated our anniversary with the Lux Punta Cana package and it was perfect. The convenience of having transportation arranged and the freedom of the golf cart made exploring so much easier. The catamaran trip was absolutely stunning - best snorkeling I've ever done. The only thing I'd change is adding more food options to the package.
testimonial.testimonial3: As a group of friends celebrating a milestone birthday, we couldnt have asked for a better setup. The private chef was incredible - he prepared an authentic Dominican feast that we are still talking about. The catamaran trip was the perfect mix of relaxation and fun. Having the golf cart made late-night food runs a breeze. Will definitely book again!

standardPageCTA.title: Ready for Your Dominican Adventure?
standardPageCTA.subtitle: Book your Lux Punta Cana package now and get ready for an unforgettable Caribbean experience with all the essential services included.

hero.description: Indulge in the ultimate Dominican Republic experience with our premium package. Elevate your vacation with exclusive luxuries, personalized service, and unforgettable moments from arrival to departure.

overview.title: Live the Experience
overview.subtitle: Indulge in the ultimate luxury with our handpicked premium services. Every moment is crafted for discerning travelers who demand nothing but the finest.
overview.experienceDescription1: Our Lux Punta Cana package redefines the Dominican vacation experience, offering an exclusive journey into luxury and personalized service. From your arrival in a premium SUV to unforgettable days aboard your private yacht, every moment is crafted for maximum enjoyment.
overview.experienceDescription2: Perfect for discerning travelers, honeymooners, or anyone celebrating a special occasion who desires the very best that Punta Cana has to offer. Every detail is meticulously arranged by our dedicated concierge team.

cta.title: Experience Ultimate Luxury
cta.description: Book your Lux Punta Cana package now and indulge in the most exclusive Caribbean experience with personalized service and premium amenities.
